articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: Did Russian Su-27 ‘Bring Down’ $32 Million MQ-9 Reaper Drone With ‘Advanced Maneuvers’? Moscow Explains - EurAsian Times
articles.description: On March 14, the US Air Force announced that a Russian Su-27 Flanker fighter jet collided with the rear propeller of its MQ-9 Reaper drone, forcing the US to bring the drone down into the Black Sea.
articles.content:
On March 14, the US Air Force announced that a Russian Su-27 fighter jet collided with the rear propeller of its MQ-9 Reaper drone, forcing the US to bring the drone down into the Black Sea. 
The US… [+5085 chars]

articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: Australia To Spend An ‘Astronomical’ $368B For ‘Second-Hand’ Nuclear Submarines; Experts Slam ‘Trillion Dollar’ Debt Deal - EurAsian Times
articles.description: More than a year after the AUKUS pact was signed in September 2021, the US, UK, and Australia have finally revealed details of their plan to build a new fleet of nuclear-powered submarines for Australia. The price, however, is astronomical.
